acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This addition was given to the Law Library by Hardy Cross Dillard's widow, Valgerdur Dillard, in the spring of 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Papers of Hardy Cross Dillard contains miscellaneous subject files, most notably a folder documenting Dillard's views on school segregation. There are also correspondence files, including letters of condolence Mrs. Dillard received after Hardy's death in 1982. In addition there are diplomas, awards and decorations, as well as over 40 photographs. These materials are followed by three boxes of Dillard's published materials.
